title: Ward skins

replies.body: Thanks for the reports, friends!  This is a known issue that we're looking into.  Specifically, some ward skins are not selectable even though they're unlocked on the account.  We'll be posting updates on this on our [server status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  I hope this news helps bring some relief!
My ward skins have also disappeared. I lost my Bouquet and Tomb Angel Ward Skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Isanaki,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AVOPEjHY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-11T03:46:47.074+0000)
>
> My ward skins have also disappeared. I lost my Bouquet and Tomb Angel Ward Skins.

-Hello " ISANAKI " I also have lost my Tomb Angel Skin but not my Gentleman poro skin .
-Got Both legacy ward skins in hextech crafting and I whould like to get my tomb angel ward skin back.
-One of my favourite ward skins ever and combines with my icon and beside from that is a skin * that cust me another skin in hextech -crafting wich means that i lost money by no reason ?
-Thats no just unfair , is stealing if riot doesnt fix this bug or glich or give an explanion to the players . 
-With the Best RegardS Demonic Legend.

                                                                                               {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
